posts.post_content:
"Well [Sangromancer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sangromancer), looks like we're on the same side this time."  
  
"Yep."  
  
"Thing is, I still don't quite trust you yet."  
  
"Oh, no, you can totally trust me, we'll team up and beat those Phyrexians all right."  
  
"...Okay, let's go." \*turns back\*  
  
"Haha psyche I'm going to yoink all your blood anyway."
posts.html:
"Well Sangromancer, looks like we're on the same side this time."

"Yep."

"Thing is, I still don't quite trust you yet."

"Oh, no, you can totally trust me, we'll team up and beat those Phyrexians all right."

"...Okay, let's go." *turns back*

"Haha psyche I'm going to yoink all your blood anyway."

Not very good in Standard as of now, but this card seems better then [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade) in most other scenarios...you see black creatures way more then artifact creatures most of the time.

Posted By: Arachibutyrophobia (8/2/2011 10:32:22 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This SHOULD have cost 2B, and perhaps gave you 3 life to help make it more comparable to [doom blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=doom blade). The way it is now, it's superior to doom blade, which was already an excellent card, and pushes artifact creatures even further up a slope that I don't think they should be ascending.  
  
Of course, I'm part of a minority, since it seems that most people are rather pleased with artifact creatures being so widespread and useable.  
  
I don't know, I guess I just never liked robot-ish creatures.
posts.html:

Of course, I'm part of a minority, since it seems that most people are rather pleased with artifact creatures being so widespread and useable.

I don't know, I guess I just never liked robot-ish creatures.

posts.post_content:
Erik's Random card 6/21/2011  
This was in the design file, priced at 2B.  
  
I thought it would make Standard more fun at 1B. This block has a lot of artifact creatures. However they were at a competitive disadvantage compared with Black creatures because of Doom Blade. Pricing this card at 1B put it on par with Doom Blade, and helped put artifact creatures on par with black creatures.
